verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w*, the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Magog|strong="H4031"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w* and \w Tubal|strong="H8422"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against him,\f + \fr 38.2 \ft the chief…: or, prince of the chief\f*

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w* and \w Tubal|strong="H8422"\w*:

And I will turn thee \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w hooks|strong="H2397"\w* into thy \w jaws|strong="H3895"\w*, and I will bring thee \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and all thine \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, all of them \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with all \w sorts|strong="H4358"\w* \add of armour, even\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w company|strong="H6951"\w* \add with\add* \w bucklers|strong="H6793"\w* and \w shields|strong="H4043"\w*, all of them \w handling|strong="H8610"\w* \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*:

\w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*, and \w Libya|strong="H6316"\w* with them; all of them with \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* and \w helmet|strong="H3553"\w*:\f + \fr 38.5 \ft Libya: or, Phut\f*

\w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w*, and all his \w bands|strong="H0102"\w*; the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Togarmah|strong="H8425"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w quarters|strong="H3411"\w*, and all his \w bands|strong="H0102"\w*: \add and\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with thee.

Be thou \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* for thyself, thou, and all thy \w company|strong="H6951"\w* that are \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* unto thee, and be thou a \w guard|strong="H4929"\w* unto them.

¶ After \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt be \w visited|strong="H6485"\w*: in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add that is\add* brought \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \add and is\add* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* out of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, against the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which have been \w always|strong="H8548"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*: but it is brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, and they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w* all of them.

Thou shalt \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* like a \w storm|strong="H7722"\w*, thou shalt be like a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, thou, and all thy \w bands|strong="H0102"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with thee.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; It shall also come to pass, \add that\add* at the same \w time|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* into thy \w mind|strong="H3824"\w*, and thou shalt \w think|strong="H2803"\w* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w thought|strong="H4284"\w*:\f + \fr 38.10 \ft think…: or, conceive a mischievous purpose\f*

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of unwalled \w villages|strong="H6519"\w*; I will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to them that are at \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, all of them \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* without \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, and having neither \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* nor \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*,\f + \fr 38.11 \ft safely: or, confidently\f*

To \w take|strong="H7997"\w* a \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, and to \w take|strong="H0962"\w* a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*; to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the desolate \w places|strong="H2723"\w* \add that are now\add* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, and upon the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that are\add* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* out of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, which have \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* and \w goods|strong="H7075"\w*, that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H2872"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 38.12 \ft To take…: Heb. To spoil the spoil, and to prey the prey\f*\f + \fr 38.12 \ft midst: Heb. navel\f*

\w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w*, and \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w*, and the \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* of \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*, with all the young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w* thereof, shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Art thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w take|strong="H7997"\w* a \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*? hast thou \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* thy \w company|strong="H6951"\w* to \w take|strong="H0962"\w* a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*? to carry \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, to take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* and \w goods|strong="H7075"\w*, to \w take|strong="H7997"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*?

¶ Therefore, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, shalt thou not \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add*?

And thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from thy \w place|strong="H4725"\w* out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w parts|strong="H3411"\w*, thou, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with thee, all of them \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w company|strong="H6951"\w*, and a \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*:

And thou shalt come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; it shall be in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee against my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* me, when I shall be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in thee, O \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w*, before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \add Art\add* thou he of whom I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in \w old|strong="H6931"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add many\add* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* that I would \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee against them?\f + \fr 38.17 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

And it shall come to pass at the same \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \add that\add* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in my \w face|strong="H0639"\w*.

For in my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \add and\add* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of my \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* have I \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, Surely in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there shall be a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shaking|strong="H7494"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

So that the \w fishes|strong="H1709"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and all creeping \w things|strong="H7431"\w* that \w creep|strong="H7430"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, and all the \w men|strong="H0120"\w* that \add are\add* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, shall \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* at my \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, and the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall be thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, and the steep \w places|strong="H4095"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and every \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 38.20 \ft steep…: or, towers, or, stairs\f*

And I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* for a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* against him throughout all my \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall be against his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

And I will \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* against him with \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* and with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; and I will \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* upon him, and upon his \w bands|strong="H0102"\w*, and upon the \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* with him, an \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, and great \w hailstones|strong="H0417"\w*, \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w*.

Thus will I \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* myself, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* myself; and I will be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
